Container.Name: Keyoxide - Web
Container.Overview:
Keyoxide is a privacy-friendly tool to create and verify decentralized online identities.
This is the web interface. It is recommended to also run a Keyoxide - Proxy container alongside it.
Container.Requires: Recommended to also run a Keyoxide - Proxy instance as well.

Config.Name: Domain
Config.Description: The domain on which the instance is hosted

Config.Name: Onion URL
Config.Description: The onion URL that points to the same instance

Config.Name: Proxy Hostname
Config.Description: The hostname and port of the Keyoxide Proxy instance (e.g., IP_ADDRESS:3001)

Config.Name: ActivityPub Public Key
Config.Description: The public key used to simulate an ActivityPub account and sign HTTP requests

Config.Name: Experimental - Enable Cache
Config.Description: Enable the experimental caching mechanism to improve performance

Config.Name: Experimental - Enable Rate Limiter
Config.Description: Enable the experimental rate limiting feature to prevent abuse

Config.Name: Internal Port
Config.Description: The internal port the web interface listens on. Not recommended to change.

Config.Name: Act as Proxy
Config.Description: Disable proxy functionality. Not recommended to change.
